title: 安装了旋转工艺后整合包会奔溃
author: wanpixiaodan
txt_content:
本帖最后由 lichi2050 于 2016-1-18 12:31 编辑 

---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// Would you like a cupcake?

Time: 16-1-18 下午2:52
Description: There was a severe problem during mod loading that has caused the game to fail

replies.author: 玩家12_强盗
replies.txt_content:
可能是中文翻译的问题。
先把mods文件夹中的Rotarycraft和dragonApi两个文件移到别的地方
然后进入游戏把语言换成英文
然后把roc和dragonApi移回去
之后想要中文可以再切回中文

replies.author: xpen
replies.txt_content: 看起来是中文汉化文件出问题了。machine.xml
